677fdcd3cbadd53ed60d5b11 description: Now the introductions are over I have a few jobs that need sorting. I'm the supplier of all the accessories you need for your weapons, but you'll have to earn them. I'll assign you tasks to accomplish. Complete them successfully, and you can expect to get better accessories. Oh, and just like Svetlana, I offer more affordable prices than other traders. I also buy back accessories at more advantageous prices, so you know where to sell them. Good luck!
677fdcd3cbadd53ed60d5b11 startedMessageT: Now the introductions are over I have a few jobs that need sorting. I'm the supplier of all the accessories you need for your weapons, but you'll have to earn them. I'll assign you tasks to accomplish. Complete them successfully, and you can expect to get better accessories. Oh, and just like Svetlana, I offer more affordable prices than other traders. I also buy back accessories at more advantageous prices, so you know where to sell them. Good luck!
677fdcd3cbadd53ed60d5b11 successMessageT: Your reputation speaks for itself. Great job! Take a look at my shop, you'll have access to new accessories.
677fdcd3bacd612dfe817a61 description: As I mentioned earlier, I have everything here, but there are some conditions to meet, and they won't be easy to meet. Your objective is to bring me all the silencers you can find, even those already installed on weapons. Don't bother looking for them in other shops, I want the authentic ones, the ones that have been used in the field. And, on top of that, I want you to end the lives of 50 scavs. It's time to get them out of my shop, it's getting unbearable.
677fdcd3bacd612dfe817a61 startedMessageT: As I mentioned earlier, I have everything here, but there are some conditions to meet, and they won't be easy to meet. Your objective is to bring me all the silencers you can find, even those already installed on weapons. And, on top of that, I want you to end the lives of 50 scavs. It's time to get them out of my shop, it's getting unbearable.
677fdcd3bacd612dfe817a61 successMessageT: Wow, there are so many silencers here! Many thanks to you for this incredible collection!
677fdcd302ff75fa82a40674 description: Sorry, mercenary! My bad for not noticing you earlier. Those annoying scavs really messed up a big chunk of my cargo, and it feels like they're just laughing at me. Here's the deal : if you're up for taking on those scavs and showing them who's boss, there could be a nice reward waiting for you.
677fdcd302ff75fa82a40674 startedMessageT: Hey there, mercenary! My bad for not noticing you earlier. Those annoying scavs really messed up a big chunk of my cargo, and it feels like they're just laughing at me. Here's the deal : if you're up for taking on those scavs and showing them who's boss, there could be a nice reward waiting for you.
677fdcd302ff75fa82a40674 successMessageT: Nice job, mercenary! Feel free to check out the goodies in my shop, there might be something that catches your eye now!
677fdcd33a40447852ab7152 description: I appreciate your work method, your efficiency and your determination. Although I do not take sides, my loyalty to my customers is unwavering. This balance with my customers allows me to provide equipment without delay at all times. However, you are an exception as an intermediary with BEARs, and I need to know that you have their complete trust. Prove it and you will be rewarded with the best arsenal you can find here in Tarkov.
677fdcd33a40447852ab7152 startedMessageT: I appreciate your work method, your efficiency and your determination. Although I do not take sides, my loyalty to my customers is unwavering. This balance with my customers allows me to provide equipment without delay at all times. However, you are an exception as an intermediary with BEARs, and I need to know that you have their complete trust. Prove it and you will be rewarded with the best arsenal you can find here in Tarkov.
677fdcd33a40447852ab7152 successMessageT: It's incredible! Help yourself, you deserve it! Maybe we'll have the opportunity to work together again on new tasks. See you soon.
